top_story.title: Movie Museum Rethinks Exhibitions in Response to a Changing World
top_story.excerpt: The Academy Museum of Motion Pictures, opening in September, has redesigned its galleries amid social movements like Black Lives Matter.

movies.title: Watch Emma Stone Become ‘Cruella’
movies.excerpt: The director Craig Gillespie discusses the formation of the title character in a scene from his film, which also features Emma Thompson.

movies.title: Five New Horror Movies to Stream Now
movies.excerpt: From haunted houses to killer dolls, these frightful offerings will keep you entertained, or up all night.

movies.title: ‘Apocalypse ’45’ Review: Graphic Images of Wartime
movies.excerpt: Candid testimonies from World War II veterans accompany vivid archival footage in this immersive documentary that showcases the myths we tell ourselves about war.

movies.title: ‘Her Man’: A Relic of a Bygone Hollywood, Now Restored
movies.excerpt: Now streaming, this mildly racy romance, from 1930, arrived before the censorious Production Code. What really sets the film apart is its incredible tracking shots.

books.title: In ‘Little Birds,’ Anaïs Nin Erotica Gets a Revolutionary New Context
books.excerpt: Created by the artist Sophia Al-Maria, the new series resituates Nin’s erotic short story collection in 1955 Morocco, a year before the country threw off its colonialist yoke.

books.title: Friederike Mayröcker, Grande Dame in German Literature, Dies at 96
books.excerpt: An Austrian, she was among the most decorated German-language poets of the postwar period, producing a large body of daring work.

books.title: Can Travel Be Fun Again?
books.excerpt: For many people, after more than a year of the pandemic, travel feels like something to dread. But it can still mean liberation, the author and psychologist argues.

books.title: In This Debut Novel, a Chinese American Assassin Roams the West
books.excerpt: 'The Thousand Crimes of Ming Tsu,' by Tom Lin, is a vengeance quest in an unforgiving landscape during the building of the Transcontinental Railroad.
